main_definition: in a way that causes disappointment or regret; regrettably.

meanings_and_examples.definition: expressing displeasure about an undesirable situation or outcome
meanings_and_examples.example: Unfortunately, the concert was canceled due to bad weather.

meanings_and_examples.definition: showing sadness over a negative event or circumstance
meanings_and_examples.example: I unfortunately missed my flight because of traffic.

meanings_and_examples.definition: indicating the presence of an unfortunate, regrettable, or undesirable aspect in a given situation
meanings_and_examples.example: Unfortunately, our team lost the match despite their best efforts.
